results.title: [The effects of atenolol on the heart size, on the heart rate, and on the blood pressure at rest (author's transl)].
results.text_hl: Cardiac functions like heart size, heart rate, and blood pressure were studied at rest in 23 digitalized and 24 not digitalized patinents recovering from a @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@, in 16 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ and in 9 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Neoplastic_Cells_Circulating</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009360 @@@regulatory dysfunctions of the circulation@@@ before and after a three week period of treatment with 2 x 50 mg or 2 x 100 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ per day.

citations.NLM: Frisch P. [The effects of atenolol on the heart size, on the heart rate, and on the blood pressure at rest (author's transl)]. Med Klin. 1978 Oct 20;73(42):1477-80. PMID: 703677
